title: torchvision install error
body_html:
Sorry to trouble you, but I get some error when I start pytorch
I set

  • PyTorch Build —— Stable
  • Your OS——Windows
  • Package——Conda
  • Language——Python 3.6
  • CUDA——8.0

It shows
Run this Command:
conda install pytorch cuda80 -c pytorchpip3 install torchvision

The first command is alright, shows # All requested packages already installed. And I can import torch.
But the second command shows:

Requirement already satisfied: torchvision in c:\program files (x86)\python36-32\lib\site-packages (0.2.1)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in c:\program files (x86)\python36-32\lib\site-packages (from torchvision) (1.13.3)
Collecting torch (from torchvision)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/5f/e9/bac4204fe9cb1a002ec6140b47f51affda1655379fe302a1caef421f9846/torch-0.1.2.post1.tar.gz
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
      File "C:\Users\qiucy\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-xstv3999\torch\setup.py", line 11, in <module>
        raise RuntimeError(README)
    RuntimeError: PyTorch does not currently provide packages for PyPI (see status at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/566).

    Please follow the instructions at http://pytorch.org/ to install with miniconda instead.


    ----------------------------------------
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in C:\Users\qiucy\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-xstv3999\torch\

I have tried use pip install torchvision, and shows the same message.
I find
Requirement already satisfied: torchvision in c:\program files (x86)\python36-32\lib\site-packages (0.2.1)
in the error message,But

import torchvision
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'torchvision'

body:
Sorry to trouble you, but I get some error when I start pytorch
I set 
- PyTorch Build —— Stable
- Your OS——Windows
- Package——Conda
- Language——Python 3.6
- CUDA——8.0

It shows 
Run this Command:
`conda install pytorch cuda80 -c `pytorch`
`pip3` install torchvision`

The first command is alright, shows  # All requested packages already installed. And I can import torch.
But the second command shows:
```
Requirement already satisfied: torchvision in c:\program files (x86)\python36-32\lib\site-packages (0.2.1)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in c:\program files (x86)\python36-32\lib\site-packages (from torchvision) (1.13.3)
Collecting torch (from torchvision)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/5f/e9/bac4204fe9cb1a002ec6140b47f51affda1655379fe302a1caef421f9846/torch-0.1.2.post1.tar.gz
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
      File "C:\Users\qiucy\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-xstv3999\torch\setup.py", line 11, in <module>
        raise RuntimeError(README)
    RuntimeError: PyTorch does not currently provide packages for PyPI (see status at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/566).

    Please follow the instructions at http://pytorch.org/ to install with miniconda instead.


    ----------------------------------------
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in C:\Users\qiucy\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-xstv3999\torch\
```
I have tried use `pip install torchvision`, and shows the same message. 
I find 
`Requirement already satisfied: torchvision in c:\program files (x86)\python36-32\lib\site-packages (0.2.1)` 
 in the error message,But
```
import torchvision
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'torchvision'
```
